Summary



Hero MotoCorp sells over 3 lakh units on DhanterasDr Reddy’s Labs: U.S. appeals court ruled that NuvaRing’s patent is validIndian Energy Exchange to start trading on BSE/NSEFrontline Securities: To buy back 13 lakh shares at Rs 62 each






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, gained 0.33 percent to 10,201 as of 7:10 am











Here are the stocks to watch out for in today’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: Dr. Reddy’s, Hero MotoCorp, IEX, Indiabulls Housing Finance, Hindustan Zinc
